comments.text:
+Lina Lin All South Korean men (unless for specific reasons like illness) 
do national military service, of almost 2 years, which you have to start 
serving before you are 30.  You can choose to go when you are 18 or go 
later but you will eventually get called to do it. Many kpop idols choose 
to go later so as to focus on their career first. Leeteuk went when he was 
nearly 29.  From SJ Leeteuk, Heechul and Kangin have already served.
comments.author: Emmzes channel

comments.text:
+Lina Lin He was in mandatory military service all members of Super Junior 
have to have been in the military for a set amount of time. Due to things 
that happened within the group a long time ago.

captions.text: [Sungmin] This is where we shoot the album images for our 7th album
[Kangin] It will be truly amazing album. So look forward to it :) Fighting!
[Kyuhyun] We are working hard to give out our best-the stage, performance- so look forward to it
[Donghae] I will work hard. Super Junior fighting~!
[Heechul] Thank you for your hard work. Thank you!
[Leeteuk] I am really looking for this album, so let me come back to you asap

title: Super Junior The 7th Album ‘MAMACITA’ Music Video Event!! - Photoshoot Making Film
